title: CIS Control: 0.0 Explicitly Not Mapped (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Prevent enabling lock screen camera' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Prevent enabling lock screen slide show' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Apply UAC restrictions to local accounts on network logons' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (DisableIPSourceRouting IPv6) IP source routing protection level (protects against packet spoofing)' is set to 'Enabled: Highest protection, source routing is completely disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (DisableIPSourceRouting) IP source routing protection level (protects against packet spoofing)' is set to 'Enabled: Highest protection, source routing is completely disabled'

(L2) Ensure 'Turn on Responder (RSPNDR) driver' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Require domain users to elevate when setting a network's location' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Hardened UNC Paths' is set to 'Enabled, with "Require Mutual Authentication" and "Require Integrity" set for all NETLOGON and SYSVOL shares'
(L1) Ensure 'Prohibit connection to non-domain networks when connected to domain authenticated network' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Require PIN pairing' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Point and Print Restrictions: When installing drivers for a new connection' is set to 'Enabled: Show warning and elevation prompt'
(L1) Ensure 'Point and Print Restrictions: When updating drivers for an existing connection' is set to 'Enabled: Show warning and elevation prompt'
(L1) Ensure 'Remote host allows delegation of non-exportable credentials' is set to 'Enabled'
(BL) Ensure 'Prevent installation of devices that match any of these device IDs' is set to 'Enabled'
(BL) Ensure 'Prevent installation of devices that match any of these device IDs: Also apply to matching devices that are already installed.' is set to 'True' (checked)
(BL) Ensure 'Prevent installation of devices that match any of these device IDs: Prevent installation of devices that match any of these device IDs' is set to 'PCI\CC_0C0A'

(L2) Ensure 'Support device authentication using certificate' is set to 'Enabled: Automatic'

(L1) Ensure 'Do not display network selection UI' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Do not enumerate connected users on domain-joined computers' is set to 'Enabled'

(L1) Ensure 'Require a password when a computer wakes (plugged in)' is set to 'Enabled'

(L1) Ensure 'Restrict Unauthenticated RPC clients' is set to 'Enabled: Authenticated'
(L1) Ensure 'Do not preserve zone information in file attachments (User)' is set to 'Disabled'

(BL) Ensure 'Require additional authentication at startup: Allow BitLocker without a compatible TPM' is set to 'Enabled: False'

title: CIS Control: 2.5 Allowlist Authorized Software (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Prevent device metadata retrieval from the Internet' is set to 'Enabled'

(L2) Ensure 'Block launching Universal Windows apps with Windows Runtime API access from hosted content.' is set to 'Enabled'

(L1) Ensure 'Manage preview builds' is set to 'Disable Preview builds'
(L1) Ensure 'Prevent non-admin users from installing packaged Windows apps' is set to 'Enabled'

title: CIS Control: 3.4 Enforce Data Retention (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Do not delete temp folders upon exit' is set to 'Disabled'

title: CIS Control: 3.6 Encrypt Data on End-User Devices (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected fixed drives can be recovered' is set to 'Enabled'
(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected fixed drives can be recovered: Recovery Key' is set to 'Enabled: Allow 256-bit recovery key'
(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected fixed drives can be recovered: Recovery Password' is set to 'Enabled: Allow 48-digit recovery password'
(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected fixed drives can be recovered: Allow data recovery agent' is set to 'Enabled: True'

(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected fixed drives can be recovered: Configure storage of BitLocker recovery information to AD DS' is set to 'Enabled: Backup recovery passwords and key packages'
(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected fixed drives can be recovered: Do not enable BitLocker until recovery information is stored to AD DS for fixed data drives' is set to 'Enabled: False'
(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected fixed drives can be recovered: Omit recovery options from the BitLocker setup wizard' is set to 'Enabled: True'
(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected fixed drives can be recovered: Save BitLocker recovery information to AD DS for fixed data drives' is set to 'Enabled: False'
(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected operating system drives can be recovered' is set to 'Enabled'
(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected operating system drives can be recovered: Recovery Key' is set to 'Enabled: Do not allow 256-bit recovery key'
(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected operating system drives can be recovered: Recovery Password' is set to 'Enabled: Require 48-digit recovery password'
(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected operating system drives can be recovered: Allow data recovery agent' is set to 'Enabled: False'

(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected operating system drives can be recovered: Configure storage of BitLocker recovery information to AD DS:' is set to 'Enabled: Store recovery passwords and key packages'

(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected operating system drives can be recovered: Do not enable BitLocker until recovery information is stored to AD DS for operating system drives' is set to 'Enabled: True'
(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected operating system drives can be recovered: Omit recovery options from the BitLocker setup wizard' is set to 'Enabled: True'
(BL) Ensure 'Choose how BitLocker-protected operating system drives can be recovered: Save BitLocker recovery information to AD DS for operating system drives' is set to 'Enabled: True'

title: CIS Control: 3.9 Encrypt Data on Removable Media (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (BL) Ensure 'Deny write access to removable drives not protected by BitLocker' is set to 'Enabled'
(BL) Ensure 'Deny write access to removable drives not protected by BitLocker: Do not allow write access to devices configured in another organization' is set to 'Enabled: False'

title: CIS Control: 3.10 Encrypt Sensitive Data in Transit (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Require secure RPC communication' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Require use of specific security layer for remote (RDP) connections' is set to 'Enabled: SSL'
(L1) Ensure 'Require user authentication for remote connections by using Network Level Authentication' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Set client connection encryption level' is set to 'Enabled: High Level'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Basic authentication' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow unencrypted traffic' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Disallow Digest authentication' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Basic authentication' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow unencrypted traffic' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Microsoft network client: Digitally sign communications (always)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Microsoft network client: Digitally sign communications (if server agrees)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Microsoft network client: Send unencrypted password to third-party SMB servers' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Microsoft network server: Digitally sign communications (always)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Microsoft network server: Digitally sign communications (if client agrees)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Network security: LAN Manager authentication level' is set to 'Send LM and NTLMv2 responses only. Refuse LM and NTLM'
(L1) Ensure 'Network security: Minimum session security for NTLM SSP based (including secure RPC) clients' is set to 'Require NTLM and 128-bit encryption'
(L1) Ensure 'Network security: Minimum session security for NTLM SSP based (including secure RPC) servers' is set to 'Require NTLM and 128-bit encryption'

title: CIS Control: 3.11 Encrypt Sensitive Data at Rest (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'WDigest Authentication' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (AutoAdminLogon) Enable Automatic Logon (not recommended)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Network security: Do not store LAN Manager hash value on next password change' is set to 'Enabled'

title: CIS Control: 4.1 Establish and Maintain a Secure Configuration Process (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L2) Ensure 'MSS: (DisableSavePassword) Prevent the dial-up password from being saved (recommended)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (EnableICMPRedirect) Allow ICMP redirects to override OSPF generated routes' is set to 'Disabled'

(L1) Ensure 'Allow Print Spooler to accept client connections' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure registry policy processing: Do not apply during periodic background processing' is set to 'Enabled: FALSE'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure registry policy processing: Process even if the Group Policy objects have not changed' is set to 'Enabled: TRUE'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure security policy processing: Do not apply during periodic background processing' is set to 'Enabled: FALSE'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure security policy processing: Process even if the Group Policy objects have not changed' is set to 'Enabled: TRUE'

(L1) Ensure 'Block user from showing account details on sign-in' is set to 'Enabled'

(L1) Ensure 'Interactive logon: Do not display last signed-in' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Network Security: Allow PKU2U authentication requests' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Input Personalization' is set to 'Block'

title: CIS Control: 4.2 Establish and Maintain a Secure Configuration Process for Network Infrastructure (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'MSS: (NoNameReleaseOnDemand) Allow the computer to ignore NetBIOS name release requests except from WINS servers' is set to 'Enabled'
(L2) Ensure 'MSS: (TcpMaxDataRetransmissions IPv6) How many times unacknowledged data is retransmitted' is set to 'Enabled: 3'

(L1) Ensure 'Prohibit installation and configuration of Network Bridge on your DNS domain network' is set to 'Enabled'

title: CIS Control: 4.3 Configure Automatic Session Locking on Enterprise Assets (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Enable screen saver (User)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (ScreenSaverGracePeriod) The time in seconds before the screen saver grace period expires (0 recommended)' is set to 'Enabled: 5 or fewer seconds'

(L1) Ensure 'Xbox Live Networking Service (XboxNetApiSvc)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow widgets' is set to 'Not allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Windows to automatically connect to suggested open hotspots, to networks shared by contacts, and to hotspots offering paid services' is set to 'Disabled'
(L2) Ensure 'Turn off location' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off Microsoft consumer experiences' is set to 'Enabled'

title: CIS Control: 5.2 Use Unique Passwords (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (BL) Ensure 'Allow enhanced PINs for startup' is set to 'Enabled'
(BL) Ensure 'Require additional authentication at startup: Configure TPM startup PIN:' is set to 'Enabled: Require startup PIN with TPM'
(L1) Ensure 'Alphanumeric Device Password Required' is set to 'Password, Numeric PIN, or Alphanumeric PIN required'
(L1) Ensure 'Device Password Expiration' is set to '365 or fewer days, but not 0'
(L1) Ensure 'Device Password History' is set to '24 or more password(s)'
(L1) Ensure 'Min Device Password Complex Characters' is set to 'Digits lowercase letters and uppercase letters are required'
(L1) Ensure 'Min Device Password Length' is set to '14 or more character(s)'
(L1) Ensure 'Minimum Password Age' is set to '1 or more day(s)'
(L1) Ensure 'Accounts: Limit local account use of blank passwords to console logon only' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Minimum PIN Length' is set to '6 more character(s)'
(L1) Ensure 'Password Age Days' is set to 'Configured: 30 or fewer'
(L1) Ensure 'Password Complexity' is set to 'Large letters + small letters + numbers + special characters'
(L1) Ensure 'Password Length' is set to 'Configured: 15 or more'

title: CIS Control: 5.6 Centralize Account Management (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Allow Microsoft accounts to be optional' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Block all consumer Microsoft account user authentication' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Disable Consumer Account State Content' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Accounts: Block Microsoft accounts' is set to 'Users can't add or log on with Microsoft accounts'

title: CIS Control: 6.8 Define and Maintain Role-Based Access Control (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L2) Ensure 'Devices: Prevent users from installing printer drivers when connecting to shared printers' is set to 'Enable'
(L1) Ensure 'Access Credential Manager As Trusted Caller' is set to 'No One'
(L1) Ensure 'Access From Network' is set to 'Administrators, Remote Desktop Users'
(L1) Ensure 'Act As Part Of The Operating System' is set to 'No One'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Local Log On' is set to 'Administrators, Users'
(L1) Ensure 'Backup Files And Directories' is set to 'Administrators'
(L1) Ensure 'Change System Time' is set to 'Administrators, LOCAL SERVICE'
(L1) Ensure 'Create Global Objects' is set to 'Administrators, LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE, SERVICE'
(L1) Ensure 'Create Page File' is set to 'Administrators'
(L1) Ensure 'Create Permanent Shared Objects' is set to 'No One'
(L1) Configure 'Create Symbolic Links'
(L1) Ensure 'Create Token' is set to 'No One'
(L1) Ensure 'Debug Programs' is set to 'Administrators'
(L1) Ensure 'Deny Access From Network' to include 'Guests, Local account'
(L1) Ensure 'Deny Local Log On' to include 'Guests'

(L1) Ensure 'Generate Security Audits' is set to 'LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE'
(L1) Ensure 'Impersonate Client' is set to 'Administrators, LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE, SERVICE'
(L1) Ensure 'Increase Scheduling Priority' is set to 'Administrators, Window Manager\Window Manager Group'
(L1) Ensure 'Load Unload Device Drivers' is set to 'Administrators'
(L1) Ensure 'Lock Memory' is set to 'No One'
(L1) Ensure 'Manage auditing and security log' is set to 'Administrators'
(L1) Ensure 'Manage Volume' is set to 'Administrators'
(L1) Ensure 'Modify Firmware Environment' is set to 'Administrators'
(L1) Ensure 'Modify Object Label' is set to 'No One'
(L1) Ensure 'Profile Single Process' is set to 'Administrators'
(L1) Ensure 'Remote Shutdown' is set to 'Administrators'
(L1) Ensure 'Restore Files And Directories' is set to 'Administrators'
(L1) Ensure 'Take Ownership' is set to 'Administrators'

title: CIS Control: 7.3 Perform Automated Operating System Patch Management (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'DO Download Mode' is NOT set to 'HTTP blended with Internet Peering'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow apps from the Microsoft app store to auto update' is set to 'Allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Auto Update' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Defer Feature Updates Period in Days' is set to 'Enabled: 180 or more days'
(L1) Ensure 'Defer Quality Updates Period (Days)' is set to 'Enabled: 0 days'
(L1) Ensure 'Scheduled Install Day' is set to 'Every day'
(L1) Ensure 'Block "Pause Updates" ability' is set to 'Block'

title: CIS Control: 8.2 Collect Audit Logs (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Enable Domain Network Firewall: Log File Path' is set to '%SystemRoot%\System32\logfiles\firewall\domainfw.log'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Private Network Firewall: Log File Path' is set to '%SystemRoot%\System32\logfiles\firewall\privatefw.log'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Public Network Firewall: Log File Path' is set to '%SystemRoot%\System32\logfiles\firewall\publicfw.log'

title: CIS Control: 8.3 Ensure Adequate Audit Log Storage (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'MSS: (WarningLevel) Percentage threshold for the security event log at which the system will generate a warning' is set to 'Enabled: 90% or less'
(L1) Ensure 'Control Event Log behavior when the log file reaches its maximum size' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Specify the maximum log file size (KB)' is set to 'Enabled: 32,768 or greater'
(L1) Ensure 'Control Event Log behavior when the log file reaches its maximum size' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Specify the maximum log file size (KB)' is set to 'Enabled: 196,608 or greater'

(L1) Ensure 'Specify the maximum log file size (KB)' is set to 'Enabled: 32,768 or greater'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Domain Network Firewall: Log Max File Size' is set to '16,384 KB or greater'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Private Network Firewall: Log Max File Size' is set to '16,384 KB or greater'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Public Network Firewall: Log Max File Size' is set to '16,384 KB or greater'

title: CIS Control: 8.4 Standardize Time Synchronization (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Enable Windows NTP Client' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Windows NTP Server' is set to 'Disabled'

title: CIS Control: 8.5 Collect Detailed Audit Logs (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Account Logon Audit Credential Validation' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Account Logon Logoff Audit Account Lockout' is set to include 'Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Account Logon Logoff Audit Group Membership' is set to include 'Success'

(L1) Ensure 'Audit Authentication Policy Change' is set to include 'Success'
(L1) Ensure 'Audit Authorization Policy Change' is set to include 'Success'

(L1) Ensure 'Audit File Share Access' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Audit Other Logon Logoff Events' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Audit Security Group Management' is set to include 'Success'
(L1) Ensure 'Audit Security System Extension' is set to include 'Success'
(L1) Ensure 'Audit Special Logon' is set to include 'Success'
(L1) Ensure 'Audit User Account Management' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Detailed Tracking Audit PNP Activity' is set to include 'Success'
(L1) Ensure 'Detailed Tracking Audit Process Creation' is set to include 'Success'
(L1) Ensure 'Object Access Audit Detailed File Share' is set to include 'Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Object Access Audit Other Object Access Events' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Object Access Audit Removable Storage' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Policy Change Audit MPSSVC Rule Level Policy Change' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Policy Change Audit Other Policy Change Events' is set to include 'Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Privilege Use Audit Sensitive Privilege Use' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'System Audit I Psec Driver' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'System Audit Other System Events' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'System Audit Security State Change' is set to include 'Success'
(L1) Ensure 'System Audit System Integrity' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Domain Network Firewall: Enable Log Dropped Packets' is set to 'Yes: Enable Logging Of Dropped Packets'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Domain Network Firewall: Enable Log Success Connections' is set to 'Enable Logging Of Successful Connections'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Private Network Firewall: Enable Log Success Connections' is set to 'Enable Logging Of Successful Connections'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Private Network Firewall: Enable Log Dropped Packets' is set to 'Yes: Enable Logging Of Dropped Packets'

(L1) Ensure 'Enable OneSettings Auditing' is set to 'Enabled'

title: CIS Control: 8.8 Collect Command-Line Audit Logs (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Include command line in process creation events' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn on PowerShell Script Block Logging' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn on PowerShell Transcription' is set to 'Enabled'

title: CIS Control: 9.3 Maintain and Enforce Network-Based URL Filters (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Enable Network Protection' is set to 'Enabled (block mode)'

title: CIS Control: 9.4 Restrict Unnecessary or Unauthorized Browser and Email Client Extensions (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Prevent downloading of enclosures' is set to 'Enabled'

title: CIS Control: 10.1 Deploy and Maintain Anti-Malware Software (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Notify antivirus programs when opening attachments (User)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off Microsoft Defender Antivirus' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Email Scanning' is set to 'Allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Realtime Monitoring' is set to 'Allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow scanning of all downloaded files and attachments' is set to 'Allowed'
(L2) Ensure 'Enable File Hash Computation' is set to 'Enable'
(L1) Ensure 'PUA Protection' is set to 'PUA Protection on'

title: CIS Control: 10.3 Disable Autorun and Autoplay for Removable Media (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Disallow Autoplay for non-volume devices' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Set the default behavior for AutoRun' is set to 'Enabled: Do not execute any autorun commands'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off Autoplay' is set to 'Enabled: All drives'

title: CIS Control: 10.4 Configure Automatic Anti-Malware Scanning of Removable Media (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Allow Full Scan Removable Drive Scanning' is set to 'Allowed'

title: CIS Control: 10.5 Enable Anti-Exploitation Features (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Enable Structured Exception Handling Overwrite Protection (SEHOP)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (SafeDllSearchMode) Enable Safe DLL search mode (recommended)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Encryption Oracle Remediation' is set to 'Enabled: Force Updated Clients'
(BL) Ensure 'Prevent installation of devices using drivers that match these device setup classes: Also apply to matching devices that are already installed.' is set to 'True' (checked)
(L1) Ensure 'Prevent device metadata retrieval from the Internet' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Boot-Start Driver Initialization Policy' is set to 'Enabled: Good, unknown and bad but critical'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure Windows Defender SmartScreen' is set to 'Enabled: Warn and prevent bypass'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off Data Execution Prevention for Explorer' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Attack Surface Reduction rules' are configured
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Network Protection' is set to 'Enabled (block mode)'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Virtualization Based Security' is set to 'Enable virtualization based security'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure System Guard Launch' is set to 'Unmanaged Enables Secure Launch if supported by hardware'
(L1) Ensure 'Require Platform Security Features' is set to 'Turns on VBS with Secure Boot' or higher
(L1) Ensure 'Credential Guard' is set to 'Enabled with UEFI lock'
(L1) Ensure 'Notify Malicious' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Notify Password Reuse' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Notify Unsafe App' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Service Enabled' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Hypervisor Enforced Code Integrity' is set to 'Enabled with UEFI lock'
(L1) Ensure 'Require UEFI Memory Attributes Table' is set to 'Require UEFI Memory Attributes Table'
(L1) Ensure 'Disallow Exploit Protection Override' is set to '(Enable)'

title: CIS Control: 10.7 Use Behavior-Based Anti-Malware Software (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L1) Ensure 'Allow Behavior Monitoring' is set to 'Allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Script Scanning' is set to 'Allowed'

title: CIS Control: 16.5 Use Up-to-Date and Trusted Third-Party Software Components (Version 8)

recommendations.title: (L2) Ensure 'Allow Font Providers' is set to 'Not allowed'
